TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter(typeof(System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter))

summary.span: 表示物件屬性值和控制項屬性值之間的簡單繫結 (Simple Binding)。

span.span: Represents the simple binding between the property value of an object and the property value of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來建立和維護簡單繫結控制項的屬性與物件的屬性，或是物件的清單中的目前物件的屬性。Use the class to create and maintain a simple binding between the property of a control and either the property of an object, or the property of the current object in a list of objects. 例如第一個案例中，您可以繫結的屬性若要控制`FirstName`屬性`Customer`物件。As an example of the first case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a `Customer` object. 例如第二個案例中，您可以繫結的屬性若要控制`FirstName`屬性，其中包含客戶。As an example of the second case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a that contains customers. 類別也可讓您設定透過顯示值的格式事件，以及擷取格式化的值，透過事件。The class also enables you to format values for display through the event and to retrieve formatted values through the event. 在建構時執行個體與建構函式，您必須指定三個項目：When constructing a instance with constructor, you must specify three items: - 繫結到控制項屬性的名稱。The name of the control property to bind to. - 資料來源。The data source. - 瀏覽路徑解析為清單或資料來源中的屬性。The navigation path that resolves to a list or property in the data source. 瀏覽路徑，也用來建立物件的屬性。The navigation path is also used to create the object's property. 首先，您必須指定您想要將資料繫結控制項屬性的名稱。First, you must specify name of the control property you want to bind the data to. 例如，若要顯示在中的資料控制項，指定屬性。For example, to display data in a control, specify the property. 第二，您可以指定下表中的任何一個類別的執行個體，做為資料來源。Second, you can specify an instance of any one of the classes in the following table as the data source. |描述Description|C# 範例C# example| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何實作類別或。Any class that implements or . 其中包括下列： ， ， ，或。These include the following: , , , or .|`DataSet ds = new DataSet("myDataSet");`| |任何實作類別若要建立之物件的索引的集合。Any class that implements to create an indexed collection of objects. 必須建立和填入建立集合。The collection must be created and filled before creating the . 在清單中的物件必須是相同的類型;否則，會擲回例外狀況。The objects in the list must all be of the same type; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.|`ArrayList ar1 = new ArrayList; Customer1 cust1 = new Customer("Louis"); ar1.Add(cust1);`| |強型別的強類型物件A strongly typed of strongly typed objects|`Customer [] custList = new Customer[3];`| 第三，您必須指定導覽路徑，它可以是空字串 ("")，單一屬性名稱或以句號分隔的名稱階層。Third, you must specify the navigation path, which can be an empty string (""), a single property name, or a period-delimited hierarchy of names. 如果您設定的導覽路徑設為空字串，會在基礎資料來源物件上呼叫方法。If you set the navigation path to an empty string, the method will be called on the underlying data source object. 如果資料來源，其中可以包含多個物件時，瀏覽路徑，必須用來解析為特定的資料行。If the data source is a , which can contain multiple objects, the navigation path must be used to resolve to a specific column. > [!NOTE] > 當資料來源時， ，或，您實際上繫結至。When the data source is a , , or , you are actually binding to a . 因此，繫結的資料列的實際物件。Consequently, the bound rows are actually objects. 以句點隔開的導覽路徑時，必須包含多個物件設定的資料來源物件 (例如或)。A period-delimited navigation path is required when the data source is set to an object that contains multiple objects (such as a or ). 當您繫結至其屬性會傳回其他物件 （例如具有屬性會傳回其他類別物件的類別） 的參考物件時，您也可以使用句號分隔的導覽路徑。You can also use a period-delimited navigation path when you bind to an object whose properties return references to other objects (such as a class with properties that return other class objects). 例如，下列所有的導覽路徑會描述有效的資料欄位：For example, the following navigation paths all describe valid data fields: - 「 Size.Height""Size.Height" - "Suppliers.CompanyName""Suppliers.CompanyName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName""Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity""Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity" 此屬性，會解析成單一值 （例如整數），或是值 （例如字串陣列） 的清單，可傳回路徑的每個成員。Each member of the path can return either a property that resolves to a single value (such as an integer), or a list of values (such as an array of strings). 雖然清單或屬性，可以是在路徑中的每個成員，最後一個成員必須解析為屬性。Although each member in the path can be a list or property, the final member must resolve to a property. 每個成員是根據前一個成員: 「 Size.Height"會解析成目前的屬性;「 Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName"會解析為第一個名稱為目前的客戶，是目前區域客戶的客戶。Each member builds on the previous member: "Size.Height" resolves to the property for the current ; "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" resolves to the first name for the current customer, where the customer is one of the customers for the current region. A藉由連結一個傳回值的清單第二個在。A returns a list of values by linking one to a second in a . 如果包含物件，您可以指定為資料成員後面接著，然後。If the contains objects, you can specify the data member as a followed by a , and then a . 例如，如果名為 「 供應 」 包含名為"suppliers2products"，資料成員可能是 「 Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName"。For example, if the named "Suppliers" contains a named "suppliers2products", the data member could be "Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName". 資料來源可以包含一組相關的類別。The data source can consist of a set of related classes. 例如，假設一組太陽系的類別。For example, imagine a set of classes that catalogs solar systems. 名為的類別`System`包含名為的屬性`Stars`傳回的集合`Star`物件。The class named `System` contains a property named `Stars` that returns a collection of `Star` objects. 每個`Star`物件具有`Name`並`Mass`屬性，以及`Planets`傳回的集合屬性`Planet`物件。Each `Star` object has `Name` and `Mass` properties, as well as a `Planets` property that returns a collection of `Planet` objects. 在此系統中，每個全球也有`Mass`和`Name`屬性。In this system, each planet also has `Mass` and `Name` properties. 每個`Planet`進一步物件具有`Moons`屬性，傳回的集合`Moon`物件，其中每一個還有`Name`和`Mass`屬性。Each `Planet` object further has a `Moons` property that returns a collection of `Moon` objects, each of which also has `Name` and `Mass` properties. 如果您指定`System`物件做為資料來源，您可以指定下列任一項為資料成員：If you specify a `System` object as the data source, you can specify any of the following as the data member: - "Stars.Name""Stars.Name" - "Stars.Mass""Stars.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Name""Stars.Planets.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Mass""Stars.Planets.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Name""Stars.Planets.Moons.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass""Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass" 可以是簡單繫結的控制項功能的集合中的物件，您可以存取透過控制項的屬性。Controls that can be simple-bound feature a collection of objects in a , which you can access through the control's property. 您將新增藉由呼叫集合方法，藉此在物件的屬性 （或清單中的目前物件的屬性） 繫結控制項的屬性。You add a to the collection by calling the method, thereby binding a property of the control to a property of an object (or to a property of the current object in a list). 您可以簡單繫結至任何物件都衍生自類別，例如，下列的 Windows 控制項：You can simple-bind to any object that derives from the class, for example, the following Windows controls: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 只有的屬性， ，和控制項是簡單的繫結。Only the property of the , , and control is simple bound. 類別是抽象類別，可管理所有特定資料來源和資料成員的物件。The class is an abstract class that manages all the objects for a particular data source and data member. 衍生自類別都而類別。Classes that derive from are the and the classes. 如何管理取決於是否清單繫結或屬性繫結。How a is managed depends on whether the is a list binding or a property binding. 例如，如果它是清單繫結時，您可以使用來指定在清單中; ，因此，會決定哪一個項目 （不在清單中的所有項目） 實際繫結至控制項。For example, if it is a list binding, you can use the to specify a in the list; the , therefore, determines which item (out of all items in the list) is actually bound to a control. 要傳回適當，使用。To return the appropriate , use the . 若要將新的資料列加入至一組繫結至相同的控制項，使用方法類別。To add a new row to a set of controls bound to the same , use the method of the class. 使用的屬性類別，以傳回適當。Use the property of the class to return the appropriate . 若要逸出的新資料列，使用方法。To escape the addition of the new row, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立 Windows 表單有幾個示範簡單資料繫結的控制項。The following code example creates a Windows Form with several controls that demonstrate simple data binding. 此範例會建立具有兩個資料表都叫做`Customers`並`Orders`，和名為`custToOrders`。The example creates a with two tables named `Customers` and `Orders`, and a named `custToOrders`. 四個控制項 (和三個控制項) 的資料繫結至資料表中的資料行。Four controls (a and three controls) are data bound to columns in the tables. 每個控制項，此範例會建立並新增透過屬性。For each control, the example creates and adds a to the control through the property. 此範例會傳回針對每個資料表透過表單。The example returns a for each table through the form's . 四個控制遞增或遞減屬性上的物件。Four controls increment or decrement the property on the objects. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定任何資料來源的下列類別的執行個體：You can specify an instance of any of the following classes for the data source: - - - - - - 任何實作類別介面Any class that implements the interface - 任何類別Any class 請參閱類別，如需有關建立`dataMember`字串。See the class for more information about creating the `dataMember` string. 當您建立繫結控制項的屬性，以新會檢查繫結控制項所公開的事件，並將附加至兩個特定的事件：When you create a binding to a control's property, the new inspects the events exposed by the bound control and attaches to two particular events: - - 名為事件*PropertyName* `Changed` (比方說， )An event named *PropertyName*`Changed` (for example, ) 如果您嘗試繫結至不存在，屬性就會擲回的時機加入至控制項的集合。If you attempt to bind to a property that does not exist, an will be thrown when the is added to the control's collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例繫結控制項中的資料表資料行名為`myDataSet`。The following code example binds a control to a table column in a named `myDataSet`. 這個範例會要求您已經宣告`myDataSet`模組的 「 宣告 」 區段中。The example requires that you have declared `myDataSet` in the declarations section of the module. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BindingComplete As BindingCompleteEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性設定為 並繫結作業完成時，例如資料從控制項推入資料來源時，反之亦然。

span.span: Occurs when the property is set to and a binding operation is complete, such as when data is pushed from the control to the data source or vice versa

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件，在下列任一條件時是`true`:This event is raised under any of the following conditions when is `true`: - 從資料來源的資料推入至的控制項屬性。Data from the data source is pushed onto the control property. - 從控制項屬性的資料推入至資料來源。Data from the control property is pushed onto the data source. 完成這些作業無關的完成狀態時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised at the completion of these operations, independent of the completion status. 例如，如果繫結作業繫結的 null 值屬性，會擲回例外狀況，但事件還是會發生。For example, if a binding operation binds a null value to a property, an exception is thrown, but the event still occurs. 此事件處理常式可以採取適當的動作，藉由檢查根據成功、 錯誤或繫結程序中的例外狀況屬性參數。The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the property of the parameter. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Format As ConvertEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於控制項屬性繫結至資料值時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is bound to a data value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料從資料來源推送至控制項時，會引發事件。The event is raised when data is pushed from the data source into the control. 您可以處理將未格式化的資料轉換成資料來源的事件格式化顯示資料。You can handle the event to convert unformatted data from the data source into formatted data for display. 從控制項到資料來源提取資料時引發事件來 unformat 所顯示的值，則重新格式化顯示的資料就會發生事件。When data is pulled from the control into the data source, the event is raised to unformat the displayed value, then the event occurs to reformat the data for display. 這可確保繫結的控制項，會顯示正確格式化的資料，不論使用者是否在控制項中輸入格式化或未格式化的資料。This ensures that the bound control displays correctly formatted data regardless of whether the user enters formatted or unformatted data in the control. 和事件可讓您建立自訂的格式來顯示資料。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果資料表中的資料型別的，您可以在當地貨幣格式顯示資料，藉由設定屬性中的格式化值事件。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，您必須 unformat 中顯示的值事件。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 事件就會發生的值變更，其中包括：The event occurs whenever the value of the changes, which includes: - 第一次屬性繫結。The first time the property is bound. - 任何時候變更。Any time the changes. - 每當資料繫結清單的排序或篩選，也就是完成時提供的清單。Whenever the data-bound list is sorted or filtered, which is accomplished when a supplies the list. 事件也會發生之後事件。The event also occurs after the event. 例如，當控制項失去焦點時，會剖析其內容。For example, when a control loses focus, its contents are parsed. 立即之後，新的資料推送到控制項、允許格式化新的內容，事件就會發生。Immediately afterward, as new data is pushed into the control, the event occurs allowing the new contents to be formatted. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，加入兩者的委派和事件，並將來的透過控制屬性。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrencyString`加入的事件委派事件，會將繫結的值格式化 (類型) 做為貨幣使用方法。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`加入的事件委派事件，將控制項所顯示的值轉換回型別。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. 這個範例假設存在名為`ds`。This example assumes the presence of a named `ds`. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`也會啟用錯誤處理行為，並造成會引發事件。Setting this property to `true` also enables error-handling behavior and causes the event to be raised. 此事件處理常式可以採取適當的動作，藉由檢查根據成功、 錯誤或繫結程序中的例外狀況屬性參數。The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the property of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 符合這些條件時，繫結是作用中：A binding is active when it meets these conditions: - 為其所有屬性。All its properties are set. - 使用者沒有呼叫或是上的所屬。The user did not call or on the that the belongs to. - 要控制所屬已建立。The control to which the belongs has been created. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印並每個值表單上。The following code example prints the and value for each on a form. summary.span: 取得或設定當資料來源包含 值時要設定成控制項屬性的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to be set as the control property when the data source contains a value.

value.span: 當資料來源包含 值時要設定成控制項屬性的 。

span.span: The to be set as the control property when the data source contains a value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源必須包含針對屬性，來正確套用。The data source must contain for the property to be correctly applied. 如果資料來源類型是例如字串或整數類型的值屬性將會被忽略。If the data source type is a type such as a string or integer the value of the property will be ignored. 此外，屬性會被忽略，如果設定為`null`。Also, the property is ignored if it is set to `null`. Null 值會加入至資料來源，當控制項屬性設定為物件。A null value will be added to the data source when the control property is set to the object of . 如果設成字串值，比較不區分大小寫。If is set to a string value, comparisons are case-insensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBindingComplete(class System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Parse As ConvertEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於資料繫結控制項的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a data-bound control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和事件可讓您建立自訂的格式來顯示資料。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果資料表中的資料型別的，您可以在當地貨幣格式顯示資料，藉由設定屬性中的格式化值事件。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，您必須 unformat 中顯示的值事件。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 事件，就會發生下列情況下：The event occurs under the following conditions: - 在後事件的，就會發生。After the event of the occurs. - 當方法的呼叫。When the method of the is called. - 當的變更 (亦即，當變更)。When the of the changes (in other words, when the changes). 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，加入兩者的委派和事件，並將來的透過控制屬性。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrencyString`加入的事件委派事件，會將繫結的值格式化 (類型) 做為貨幣使用方法。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`加入的事件委派事件，將控制項所顯示的值轉換回型別。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Parse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Parse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的資料繫結屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the control's data-bound property.

value.span: 所要繫結的控制項屬性名稱。

span.span: The name of a control property to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來指定您想要繫結至資料來源中的清單控制項屬性。Use the to specify the control property that you want to bind to a list in a data source. 大多數情況下，您將屬性繫結顯示這類屬性控制項。Most commonly, you bind a display property such as the property of a control. 不過，因為您可以繫結控制項的任何屬性，您可以在執行階段使用資料庫中的資料以程式設計方式建立控制項。However, because you can bind any property of a control, you can programmatically create controls at run time using data from a database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印每個值每個控制項在表單上。The following code example prints the value of each for each control on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從控制項屬性讀取目前的值，並將它寫入資料來源中。

span.span: Reads the current value from the control property and writes it to the data source.
